General.Name: Ora Gold Ltd
General.Description: Ora Gold Limited engages in the mineral exploration activities in Australia. The company primarily explores for copper, gold, and uranium; and base metals, such as nickel and graphite. Its flagship project is the Garden Gully property comprising Crown Prince, Lydia, Abernathy, and Transylvania mining lease applications, 1 granted prospecting licenses, and 6 exploration licenses covering an area of 217 square kilometers located in Meekatharra, Western Australia. It also holds interests in Red Bore project with two square kilometer granted mining license located in the Doolgunna Region of the Murchison mineral field near Perth, Western Australia; and Keller Creek project with an exploration license covering an area of approximately 26 square kilometers located near Halls Creek, Western Australia. The company was formerly known as Thundelarra Limited and changed its name to Ora Gold Limited in March 2019. Ora Gold Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is based in West Perth, Australia.

0.Name: Mr. Frank  DeMarte BBus(Acct), FAICD, FCIS, FCSA, FGIA
0.Title: CFO, Company Sec. & Exec. Director
